name: Transportation
description: Showcasing the various ways of human transportation and cargo transportation, from ancient to modern, from land to air, witnessing the evolution of technology and life.

groups.name: Classic Vintage Cars
groups.description: The retro elegance and collectible value of old cars.

groups.name: Modern Sedans
groups.description: The diversification of design for daily commuting and family use.

groups.name: Trains and Railways
groups.description: Long-distance transportation, railway culture, and station scenery.

groups.name: Airplanes and Airports
groups.description: Air travel and the symbol of modern flying technology.

groups.name: Ships and Maritime
groups.description: The vast experience of ocean freight or cruise travel.

groups.name: Subways and Light Rails
groups.description: The convenient vehicles in urban public transportation systems.

groups.name: Motorcycles and Bike Culture
groups.description: The symbol of speed and freedom, the unique charm of street riding.

groups.name: Hot Air Balloons
groups.description: The romantic way of slowly rising and overlooking scenery.

groups.name: Airships and Air Transportation
groups.description: The transportation tool that combines classic and romantic elements.

groups.name: Spacecraft and Spacecraft
groups.description: The cutting-edge technology and human dreams of exploring space.

groups.name: Classic Horse-Drawn Carriages
groups.description: The grandeur and retro of the main transportation tools in history.

groups.name: Magnetic Levitation Trains
groups.description: The high-speed, low-noise train technology of the future.

groups.name: Space Elevators (Science Fiction)
groups.description: The conceptual future transportation tool connecting the earth and orbit.

groups.name: Future Concept Cars
groups.description: The avant-garde, high-tech experimental vehicles.

groups.name: Submarines and Underwater Navigation
groups.description: The special vehicles for exploring ocean secrets.

groups.name: Freight Trucks
groups.description: The solid backbone of modern logistics and highway transportation.

groups.name: Luxury Cruise Ships
groups.description: The floating palaces combining sea travel and sightseeing.

groups.name: High-Speed Railways
groups.description: The fast passenger transportation system spanning cities and regions.

groups.name: Racing Cars and Supercars
groups.description: The pinnacle of speed and vehicle engineering.

groups.name: Military Vehicles
groups.description: Tanks, military aircraft, armored vehicles, and other military equipment.

groups.name: Cable Cars
groups.description: The cable car routes crossing valleys or urban skies.

groups.name: Rescue Vehicles
groups.description: Fire trucks, ambulances, police cars, and other emergency service tools.

groups.name: Bicycles and Cycling
groups.description: The green, healthy, and convenient way of transportation.

groups.name: Autonomous Vehicles
groups.description: The future trend of AI autonomous driving and intelligent transportation.
